revision.comment: Created page with "This is a property of type [[Has type::String]]. The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value::General]] * [[Allows value::Specific]]"
revision.text:
This is a property of type [[Has type::String]].
The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value::General]] * [[Allows value::Specific]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::String]]. The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value::General]] * [[Allows value::Specific]]

Specific-level metaphors occupy a low level on a scale of generality on which conceptual metaphors can be placed. They are composed of specifi c-level source and target domains. Specific-level metaphors are instantiations, or special cases, of generic-level ones. Thus, the metaphor ANGER IS A HOT FLUID IN A CONTAINER is an instantiation, or special case, of the generic-level metaphor EMOTIONS ARE FORCES.

revision.comment: Created page with "This is a property of type [[Has type::String]]. The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value::Primary]] * [[Allows value::Composed/complex]] * [[Allows value::..."
revision.text:
This is a property of type [[Has type::String]].
The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value::Primary]] * [[Allows value::Composed/complex]] * [[Allows value::Entailed]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::String]]. The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value::Primary]] * [[Allows value::Composed/complex]] * [[Allows value::Entailed]]

A primary metaphor is one that emerges directly from correlations in experience, as in MORE IS UP, PURPOSES ARE DESTINATIONS , (abstract) ORGANIZATION IS PHYSICAL STRUCTURE , PERSISTENCE IS BEING ERECT , and so on Several primary metaphors can be joined together to form complex metaphors, such as THEORIES ARE BUILDINGS , which is constituted by the last two primary metaphors.

This is a property of type [[Has type::String]]. The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value::Primary]]: Both source and target are primary experience. And these experiences are correlated. ** MORE IS UP, STATES ARE LOCATIONS * [[Allows value::Composed/complex]]: ** LIFE IS A JOURNEY * [[Allows value::Entailed]] ** ENTERING A STATE IS ARRIVING AT A DESTINATION (by STATES ARE LOCATIONS)

A primary metaphor is one that emerges directly from correlations in experience, as in MORE IS UP, PURPOSES ARE DESTINATIONS , (abstract) ORGANIZATION IS PHYSICAL STRUCTURE , PERSISTENCE IS BEING ERECT , and so on Several primary metaphors can be joined together to form complex metaphors, such as THEORIES ARE BUILDINGS , which is constituted by the last two primary metaphors.

This is a property of type [[Has type::String]]. The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value::Primary]] ** Both source and target are primary experience. And these experiences are correlated. ** MORE IS UP, STATES ARE LOCATIONS * [[Allows value::Composed/complex]]: ** LIFE IS A JOURNEY * [[Allows value::Entailed]] ** ENTERING A STATE IS ARRIVING AT A DESTINATION (by STATES ARE LOCATIONS)

A primary metaphor is one that emerges directly from correlations in experience, as in MORE IS UP, PURPOSES ARE DESTINATIONS , (abstract) ORGANIZATION IS PHYSICAL STRUCTURE , PERSISTENCE IS BEING ERECT , and so on Several primary metaphors can be joined together to form complex metaphors, such as THEORIES ARE BUILDINGS , which is constituted by the last two primary metaphors.

This is a property of type [[Has type::String]]. The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value::Primary]] ** Both source and target are primary experiences. And these experiences are correlated early on. ** MORE IS UP, STATES ARE LOCATIONS * [[Allows value::Composed/complex]]: ** LIFE IS A JOURNEY * [[Allows value::Entailed]] ** ENTERING A STATE IS ARRIVING AT A DESTINATION (by STATES ARE LOCATIONS)

A primary metaphor is one that emerges directly from correlations in experience, as in MORE IS UP, PURPOSES ARE DESTINATIONS , (abstract) ORGANIZATION IS PHYSICAL STRUCTURE , PERSISTENCE IS BEING ERECT , and so on Several primary metaphors can be joined together to form complex metaphors, such as THEORIES ARE BUILDINGS , which is constituted by the last two primary metaphors.

revision.comment: Created page with "This property is of type [[Has type::String]]"
revision.text: This property is of type [[Has type::String]]

This property is of type [[Has type::String]] It allows the following values: * ANGER IS FIRE [[Allows value::is a source subcase of]] (is source special case of, is source specific case of) ANGER IS HEAT * LIFE IS A JOURNEY [[Allows value::makes use of]] ACHIEVING A PURPOSE IS REACHING A DESTINATION * ANGER IS A SUBSTANCE [[Allows value::is a target subcase of]] (is target special case of, is target specific case of) EMOTIONS ARE SUBSTANCES * RELATIONSHIPS ARE VEHICLES [[Allows value::is a mapping within]] ROMANTIC RELATIONSHIP IS A JOURNEY * [[Allows value::has as transitive subpart 1]] * [[Allows value::has as transitive subpart 2]] * [[Allows value::is in some source relation to]] * ROMANTIC RELATIONSHIP IS A JOURNEY [[Allows value::is in some target relation to]] LIFE IS A JOURNEY * [[Allows value::is in some way related to]]

This property is of type [[Has type::String]] It allows the following values: * [[Allows value::is both a source and target subcase of]] * [[Allows value::is a source subcase of]] (is source special case of, is source specific case of) * [[Allows value::is a target subcase of]] (is target special case of, is target specific case of) * [[Allows value::is a mapping within]] * [[Allows value::makes use of]] * [[Allows value::has as transitive subpart 1]] * [[Allows value::has as transitive subpart 2]] * [[Allows value::is in some source relation to]] * [[Allows value::is in some target relation to]] * [[Allows value::is an entailment of]] * [[Allows value::is in some way related to]]

revision.comment: جایگزینی متن - 'is (somehow|in some way) related to' به 'is related to'

This property has type [[Has type::String]]. It allows the following values: {| class="wikitable" |- ! value ! definition ! example |- ! [[Allows value::makes use of]] | evokes/uses | INTO makes use of CONTAINER and SPG |- ! [[Allows value::is subcase of]] | includes and adds to or further constrains | BOAT is a subcase of SEAFARING VEHICLE
OBJECT is a subcase of ENTITY |- ! [[Allows value::]] | | |- ! [[Allows value::]] | | |- ! [[Allows value::]] | | |}

[[Allows value::makes use of]] | evokes/uses | INTO makes use of CONTAINER and SPG |- ! [[Allows value::is subcase of]] | includes and adds to or further constrains | Boat is a subcase of Seafaring_vehicle
Object is a subcase of Entity |- ! [[Allows value::is somehow related to]] | elsewhere bucket | Romantic_relationship is somehow related to Life |}

[[Allows value::is subcase of]] | includes and adds to or further constrains | Boat is a subcase of Seafaring_vehicle

[[Allows value::makes use of]] | evokes/uses | Into makes use of Container and Source_path_goal |- ! [[Allows value::is subcase of]] | includes and adds to or further constrains | Boat is a subcase of Seafaring_vehicle
Object is a subcase of Entity |- ! [[Allows value::is a subprocess of]] | is spectrally a subprocess of the other schema | |- ! [[Allows value::is related to]] | elsewhere bucket | Romantic_relationship is related to Life |- ! [[Allows value::is in a scalar opposition to]] | opposite ends of a scale | Immorality is in a scalar opposition to morality |}

[[Allows value::is subcase of]] | includes and adds to or further constrains | Boat is a subcase of Seafaring_vehicle

This property has type [[Has type::String]]. It allows the following values: {| class="wikitable" |- ! relation type ! definition ! example |- ! [[Allows value::makes use of]] | evokes/uses | Into makes use of Container and Source_path_goal |- ! [[Allows value::is subcase of]] | includes and adds to or further constrains | Boat is a subcase of Seafaring_vehicle
Object is a subcase of Entity |- ! [[Allows value::is a subprocess of]] | is aspectually a subprocess of the other schema | |- ! [[Allows value::incorporates as a role]] | Schema 1 incorporates Schema 2 as a role. This is a specific kind of "makes use of" relation. | Object incorporates as a role Size |- ! [[Allows value::is related to]] | elsewhere bucket | Romantic_relationship is related to Life |- ! [[Allows value::is in a scalar opposition to]] | opposite ends of a scale | Immorality is in a scalar opposition to morality |- ! [[Allows value::is a perspective on]] | is a perspective on | Buying is a perspective on Commercial transaction |}
